body:
Two ideas
#1 There is change that would help walls games. Make it so the players that are playing can not see the spectators chat because they give out too much tactical information that can help a team win the game.
#2 I don't know if this is possible for more maps to have walls underground in caves. So if you are mining it would make it more difficult to hide and then games would be much shorter.

title: Some ideas for walls
